official_title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to provide assistance for the installation of security devices in the residences of elderly persons.

summary.text: Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to provide assistance for the installation of security devices in the residences of elderly persons. Includes projects to assist older persons to install security devices in the list of projects eligible for grants from the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to provide assistance for the installation of security devices in the residences of elderly persons.
